name: Spicy Dicey Puzzler
description:
NOTE: IF YOUR ONLINE BUILD FREEZES AFTER A FEW LEVELS OR JUST DOESNT MOVE YOU MOST LIKELY CLICKED OUT OF THE WINDOW TRY FOCUSING THE WINDOW BY PRESSING ON THE GAME AGAIN.

Spicey Dicey Puzzler is an isometric 3d game about reaching the end of the level with a 2 on your dice. However... there is a twist, if you move to the east or the west your dice gets reset to 1 which makes for some very mind twisting puzzles towards the end of the game. This game is very performant very performant as it was written in pure code(no game engine) and it was written in an ECS framework with bevy.

The web build is actually quite performant although it may take a while to load if you have a bad computer lmao.
